content: The PAC Titan 'Bogatyr' docked at the Titan Port on the coast of Mumbai, refueling and resupplying. Despite the Ice Age, even a snowy India was as hot as expected. A welcome thing too. "Well, some much appreciated downtime." thought Demichev as he stepped out of the terminal and into the lounge, where civilians and soldiers of various ethnicities moved about. Demichev sat down next to a couple of PAC soldiers and civilians at the counter. He looked up at the Holo-TV, where news about new construction projects in PAC Bavaria were being discussed. Demichev leaned in next to you, and asked "Well comrade, what are your views on this development ?"
